title: Firewall Log Review
text: Check the firewall logs for weirdness

title: Endpoint Analysis
text: Investigate activity directly on the endpoint.

title: Endpoint Security Protection Analysis
text: Analyze Aggregated endpoint data in the management console

title: Malicious Service
text: The attackers add a service that starts every time the system starts.

title: Phish
text: The attackers send a malicious email targeting users.

title: Kerberoasting
text: The attackers use a 'feature' of SPNs to extract and crack service passwords.

title: HTTP As Exfil
text: The attackers use HTTP as an exfil method.

title: Honeypots Deployed
text: The defenders had honeypots on their network.
